#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;


struct data
{
	int item,satis;
	float ratio;
};

inline void inp( int &n ) 
{
	n=0;
	int ch=getcx();int sign=1;
	while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=getcx();}
	
	while(  ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
	        n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getcx();
	n=n*sign;
}

bool operator < (data n1, data n2)
	{
		return n1.ratio > n2.ratio;
	}
	
int main()
	{
	int n,m;
	int item, satis;
	inp(n);
	inp(m);
	while(!(n==0 && m==0))
	{
	struct data array[m];
	for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
		inp(item);
		inp(satis);
		array[i].item = item;
		array[i].satis = satis;
		if(item==0)
		 array[i].ratio = 1999;
		else
		 array[i].ratio = (1.0 * satis)/item;
		}
		sort(array,array+m);
		int sum=0;
		satis=0;
	for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
		if(sum<n)
			{
			sum=sum+array[i].item;
			satis=satis+array[i].satis;
			if(sum>n)
				{
				sum=sum-array[i].item;
				satis=satis-array[i].satis;
				break;
				}
			}
		}
	printf("%d %d\n",sum,satis);
	inp(n);
	inp(m);
}

}
